title: Crime Boss: Rockay City - Tactical Weapon Pack Giveaway
description: Claim your free Crime Boss: Rockay City - Tactical Weapon Pack! Each pack unlocks handguns, a rifle and a shotgun! Please note the base game Crime Boss: Rockay City is required to enjoy this add-on content.
instructions:
1. Claim directly via Epic Games Store before the offer expires (This DLC is also available on Playstation Store and Xbox).
2. Have fun!
platforms: PC, Epic Games Store, Playstation 5, Xbox Series X|S, Xbox One

title: Century: Age of Ashes Aldrüni Pack Key Giveaway
description: Score a free Century: Age of Ashes Aldrüni Pack key and unlock the Aldrüni Shrines Dragon and 300 Gems. Are you ready to rule the skies?
instructions:
1. Log in or register to your free Alienware Arena account.
2. Click the button to unlock your key and follow the giveaway instructions.
platforms: PC, Steam, Epic Games Store, Xbox Series X|S, Xbox One, Android, iOS

title: Brawlhalla: Hraesvelgr's Eyes Blasters Weapon Skin Key Giveaway
description: Claim your free Hraesvelgr's Eyes Blasters Weapon Skin Key for Brawlhalla!
instructions:
1. Complete all steps to unlock your key
2. To redeem your key, go to the in-game store
3. Then type your code into "Redeem Code" at the bottom
platforms: PC, Xbox Series X|S, Playstation 4, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch, Android, iOS

title: Dead by Daylight Codes
description: Are you looking for Dead by Daylight Codes? Today is your lucky day, grab lots Dead by Daylight Codes and unlock Bloodpoints, Shards, Rift Fragments, Charms and more. We are constantly updating those codes so check them out.
instructions:
1. Click the get button to access the coupon codes list provided by our sister site GamerCoins.
2. Redeem all the codes instantly! It's that easy!
platforms: PC, Playstation 5, Xbox Series X|S, Playstation 4, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch

title: Rocket League Live Bundle Pack Code
description: Claim your free Rocket League Live Bundle Pack and unlock in-game items for Rocket League! Each pack unlocks an RLCS Theme, Hustle Brows, Aero Mage: Hatch and Neon Runner. This code is time-limited so grab it now!
instructions:
1. Click the get button to access all the coupon codes list provided by our sister site GamerCoins.
2. Redeem all the codes!
platforms: PC, Playstation 5, Xbox Series X|S, Playstation 4, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch

title: GamerCoins Early Access
description:
We are excited to announce that we are currently working on a new project titled GamerCoins.

GamerCoins is your new home for game codes, coupons, and other gaming perks. But more than that, we are trying to bring everything to another level.

Please note this is still work in progress. If you like it, share it with your friends, that would mean a lot to us.
instructions:
1. GamerCoins is currently in beta but everyone can access it without restrictions.
2. If you find any bugs please let us know at contact@gamercoins.com

title: Destiny 2: Be True Emblem Code
description:
Claim your Destiny 2: Be True Emblem Code for free! Find the code below and follow the instructions to redeem your Emblem code.

CODE: ML3-FD4-ND9
instructions:
1. Navigate to the Destiny 2 code redemption page (click on the "Get Loot" button).
2. Choose your platform, sign in to your platform account, then just add your code and redeem it.
platforms: PC, Steam, Playstation 5, Xbox Series X|S, Playstation 4, Xbox One

title: Metal Slug 3 Giveaway
